email.label: Email address
email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address
email.exists: This email address is already registered

password.label: Password
password.minLength: Password must be at least {min} characters long
password.maxLength: Password must be no more than {max} characters long
password.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password.number: Password must contain at least one number
password.special: Password must contain at least one special character

newPassword.label: New password
newPassword.sameAsCurrent: New password must be different from current password

name.minLength: Name must be at least {min} characters long
name.maxLength: Name must be no more than {max} characters long

fullName.maxLength: Full name must be no more than {max} characters long

firstName.maxLength: First name must be no more than {max} characters long

lastName.maxLength: Last name must be no more than {max} characters long

username.maxLength: Username must be no more than {max} characters long

phone.label: Phone number

address.maxLength: Address must be no more than {max} characters long

dateOfBirth.label: Date of birth
dateOfBirth.future: Date of birth cannot be in the future
dateOfBirth.tooYoung: You must be at least {min} years old

website.label: Website

bio.label: Bio

subject.maxLength: Subject must be no more than {max} characters long

terms.label: I agree to the terms and conditions

privacy.label: I agree to the privacy policy
privacy.required: You must agree to the privacy policy

newsletter.label: Subscribe to newsletter

slug.maxLength: Slug must be at most {max} characters

ipAddress: Please enter a valid IP address

avatar.format: Only JPG, PNG, or GIF formats are allowed

currency.length: Currency code must be exactly 3 characters
